posts.post_content:
Offered here are two S74 white silks priced to sell. Both are white silks without the ad backs. Marquard is printed with brown ink. It has some light staining and fraying but a great image, decent centering and bold brown printing. Parent has the more interesting AL player design with bats, a glove and catcher's mask present. It has deep blue printing and presents very nicely. Both Sold
Marquard 59.00
Parent 29.00

Prices net to me with 5.00 for shipping and tracking
